content: of 9 sts round 7 behind and under the ch2 of round 6 to leave a loop at the front of your work take the chain of 9 sts round 8 behind and pull through the loop of round 7 stitches repeat this last step on all subsequent rounds you may find it helpful to use stitch markers in the ends of loops if you are weaving this as you go through each round rrnndd col instructions shape total our at end stitches of round set a chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form a ring or work magic_ring up 1 a chain 1 does not count as st 8 half_double_crochet in ring circle 8 half_double_crochet 2 a *2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * 7 more times circle 16 half_double_crochet 3 b *4 bpdc chain 2* repeat from * to * 3 more times circle 16 bpdc 4 chain-space catkitbob designs goldhanger122025v1 page 2 of 6 round col instructions shape total our at end stitches of round 4 b chain 1 does not count as st * single_crochet in next 2 sts chain 3 single_crochet in next 2 square 28 single_crochet 4 chain- sts 3 single_crochet in chain-space* repeat from * to * 3 more times space 5 c * 3dc chain 1 3dc in chain-space skip 2 single_crochet in next 2 sts chain 3 single_crochet again quatre 16 single_crochet 24 in last worked st single_crochet skip 2* repeat from * to * 3 more times foil double_crochet 8 chain-space note the single_crochet are worked into 3rd & 4th then 4th & 5th of the 7 single_crochet st groups in round 4 6 d * single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in ch3-space skip 1 slip_stitch into quatre 16 single_crochet 16 single_crochet single_crochet in 1st double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in ch1-space double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet sl foil half_double_crochet 24 double_crochet st in single_crochet skip 1* repeat from * to * 3 more times 8 treble_crochet 8 chain-space 7 e * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in ch1-space 2 bpdc bphdc skip 2 single_crochet in single_crochet and quatre 16 single_crochet 24 next st half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st chain 9 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet skip foil double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 2 bphdc 2 bpdc* repeat from * to * 3 more times 8 bphdc note the skipped sts in this round are a slip_stitch and a single_crochet each time 16 bpdc 8 chain-space 8 b repeat round 7 note skipped sts in this round are a bphdc and single_crochet ditto ditto 9 c repeat round 7 ditto ditto 10 d repeat round 7 ditto ditto 11 e *single_crochet in ch1-space half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet skip 1 chain 1 popcorn skip 1 chain 2 twice 2 double_crochet square 4 single_crochet 8 half_double_crochet in next st chain 9 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet skip 1 chain 1 popcorn skip 1 chain 2 32 double_crochet twice 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet* repeat from *
